title: Beam Sword
summaries: The Beam Sword is a rare Hardmode sword that fires a gold-colored projectile which also emits a small amount of light. The projectile deals full damage of the weapon. It can be swung more frequently than its projectile can fire. It has a 0.67*1/150 (0.67%) chance of being dropped by Armored Skeletons.
